title: The anti-anhedonic Aggies: Can Mike Elko and this Texas A&M team make all the talk about the past stop?
content: The Aggies head into their first College Football Playoff appearance looking to banish the program's ghosts.

title: Sources: Dolphins bench Tua in favor of Ewers
content: The Dolphins are benching quarterback Tua Tagovailoa and turning to rookie Quinn Ewers as their new starter, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: Sources: Knicks will not hang Cup banner at MSG
content: The Knicks have decided against hanging a banner at Madison Square Garden for winning the NBA Cup, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania.

title: Alcaraz splits with coach after 7 years, 6 Slams
content: Top-ranked Carlos Alcaraz is ending his pairing with longtime coach Juan Carlos Ferrero, a partnership that resulted in six Grand Slam titles.

title: At 42-0, Crawford retires: 'Nothing left to prove'
content: Five-division champion Terence Crawford announced his retirement from boxing Tuesday, saying he was "walking away as a great with nothing else left to prove."

title: Love heads to NFL draft after stellar Irish run
content: Jeremiyah Love, the star Notre Dame running back and Heisman Trophy finalist, made it official Tuesday night and declared for the 2026 NFL draft.

title: Silver: NBA expansion decision will be made in '26
content: Adam Silver laid out a definitive timeline for expansion for the first time, saying a decision will be made sometime in 2026 on whether to add more NBA teams.

title: Kerr: Lacob email no big deal; Dubs all frustrated
content: Steve Kerr acknowledged a leaked email exchange between Warriors owner Joe Lacob and a fan that illustrated frustrations with the team, but he maintained that he and Lacob still have a "great connection."

title: ACC unveils 'transition' 2026 conference schedule
content: Twelve of the ACC's 17 schools will play nine conference football games in 2026, while five schools, with already scheduled Power Four opponents, will play eight games.

title: MLB free agency reset: Predictions for the remaining top 10 free agents
content: A number of impact players are off the market, but there are still big names to be signed. Where do they fit best?

title: Updated contract projections for the top four free agent hitters
content: Pete Alonso and Kyle Schwarber getting big bucks could help bring bigger paydays to other available hitters.

title: What we're hearing about the Mahomes and Parsons fallout, plus feedback on Rivers' return
content: Here's the latest, including intel on Patrick Mahomes, Micah Parsons, Philip Rivers, playoff races and offseason trade candidates.

title: How NFL teams complain to the league about officiating calls
content: John Harbaugh grumbling about an overturned TD is an example of why the NFL pays attention to complaints.

title: English soccer's drinking culture has faded from the Rooney era to now, but it's not gone
content: Wayne Rooney's honesty about his battle with alcohol during his prime has brought English soccer's issues back to the forefront. The one positive might be how clubs are investing in resources and care to help.

title: Meet Alpi and Twin: The star duo hoping to lead the Rockets to a title
content: Amen Thompson and Alperen Sengun spent the offseason 6,000 miles apart as they worked to reach a new level this season.

title: Power Rankings: Cavaliers and 76ers cling onto contention in East
content: NBA insiders break down where all 30 teams stand in this week's rankings ahead of the holiday season.

title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this year's bowl games
content: With first-year success stories, chances at redemption and general silliness, bowl season always delivers.

title: Reranking the top 10 men's basketball Freshman of the Year contenders
content: North Carolina's Caleb Wilson rounds out a solid top three while three new names crack the latest edition.

title: Power Rankings: Louisville in, UNC out of top 16
content: Has Louisville emerged as the ACC favorite? The Cardinals break into the poll ahead of Saturday's clash with Tennessee.

title: Bracketology: Five contenders -- and everyone else
content: UConn, Texas, South Carolina and UCLA remain 1-seeds -- and LSU is the only real challenger behind them.

title: Can the NBA Cup's surprise finalists make a Finals run? Why there's already a road map
content: ESPN analyst Kevin Pelton breaks down how the finalist Spurs and semifinalist Magic can use their cup experience for the postseason.

title: Geek and destroy: How Bruins winger Morgan Geekie has defied goal-scoring regression
content: Many expected the 27-year-old to take a step back from his 33 goals last season. Instead, he's on pace for 58.

title: Inside the ugly Chris Paul-Clippers divorce -- and a season on the brink of disaster
content: A future Hall of Famer at the end of his career, looking for one final ride. Here's why the Chris Paul-Clippers reunion was doomed.

title: Don't doubt Terence Crawford, even in his retirement from boxing
content: After proving everyone wrong in defeating Canelo Alvarez, Crawford can walk away on his own terms -- for good.

title: Projecting Golden Boy, Girl 2026: Estêvão, Yohannes to succeed Doué, Agyemang?
content: PSG's Désiré Doué and Arsenal's Michelle Agyemang won the 2025 Golden Boy and Girl awards for the best player under the age of 21, but who could win it next year?

title: What is the world record for the longest penalty shootout in soccer history?
content: The 2025 Apertura final had the longest shootout in Liga MX history. But the world record? Not even close.

title: The 'what ifs' that could've won Verstappen, Piastri the F1 title
content: Buying into counterfactuals is unwise but entertaining, and these "what if" moments could well have won Max Verstappen or Oscar Piastri the F1 title.

title: Which NFL teams are rising -- or falling -- after 15 weeks? Our new Power Rankings
content: Let's update our NFL Power Rankings ahead of Week 16. We also looked at players who could get contract extensions this offseason.

title: Spinning Week 15 forward: Broncos and Rams clinched ... can they reach the Super Bowl?
content: Sizing up the Broncos and Rams in their respective conferences, Philip Rivers' return to the NFL and more.

title: Updated Top 100 rankings for the 2026 NBA draft: Which top prospects are rising and falling?
content: Which top prospects shifted the most on our first rankings update? Here's our 100 big board for the 2026 class.

title: Scouts, coaches weigh in on three-man race for No. 1 pick of 2026 NBA draft
content: It's a tight race at the top of the 2026 draft. We talked to insiders to learn where things stand now.

title: Facts vs. Feelings: Bo Nix and six other potential playoff heroes
content: We don't get to know the script before the game's played, but the facts portend who has a chance to play hero.

title: Early Week 16 bets: Broncos over Jaguars, Drake Maye to win MVP among picks
content: Which lines offered value once odds came out? Here are games we are eyeing for bets going into Week 16.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United's Fernandes on Bayern's radar
content: Manchester United midfielder Bruno Fernandes has hit the headlines recently and is now on the radar of Bayern Munich. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Trump, troops and trouble at home: Why Asim Munir's next move could shake Pakistan
content: Pakistan army chief, Asim Munir is facing a critical challenge in his way of constantly rising to power as the US presses Islamic Republic to contribute troops to a Gaza stabilisation force. This move could trigger significant opposition within Pakistan. Munir's upcoming visit to Washington is expected to focus on this sensitive issue. Analysts warn of potential domestic unrest if Pakistan agrees to the deployment.

title: 4th T20I: No toss, no play! Fog kills India vs South Africa clash in Lucknow
content: Dense fog and smog led to the abandonment of the fourth T20 International between India and South Africa in Lucknow without a ball being bowled. Umpires conducted multiple inspections throughout the evening, ultimately deeming conditions unsafe for play due to poor visibility. India maintains a 2-1 series lead heading into the final match.

title: Pakistan: Imran Khan's sisters, supporters booked under anti-terrorism law; 14 arrested
content: Pakistan police have registered a case under the Anti-Terrorism Act against former PM Imran Khan's sisters and dozens of supporters. The action follows a protest sit-in outside Adiala Jail after authorities denied family and lawyer access to the incarcerated leader. Several PTI leaders and workers were also named in the FIR, with some arrests made.

title: Message for Trump? FM Sitharaman says 'tariffs weaponised trade'; clears India's negotiation stand
content: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman highlighted that global trade is increasingly being weaponized through tariffs and other measures. She warned India must negotiate carefully in this evolving landscape, where trade is no longer free and fair. Sitharaman emphasised that India's actions aim to protect domestic industries from unfair competition and predatory practices.

title: Still afloat, still fragile: How Pakistan economy is dodging a complete collapse — explained
content: Pakistan's economy survives through repeated IMF bailouts, tactical monetary policy, and selective foreign investment, particularly from China. Despite signs of financial market confidence and tentative re-engagement with the US, deep structural issues like 'state capture' and elite privilege persist, hindering sustainable prosperity and leaving the nation in a cycle of crisis.

title: US warns EU over tech rules: Threatens action on Spotify & others; Cites Google, Apple fines
content: The US is unhappy with the EU's strict tech regulations and has threatened sanctions on European firms like Spotify and SAP. The USTR claims American tech giants face discriminatory taxes and lawsuits, while EU companies operate freely in the US. Brussels insists its rules apply equally to all, but the US warns of retaliatory measures if the EU persists.

title: 'What if he had touched... ': UP minister defends Nitish amid Hijab row; later backtracks
content: Uttar Pradesh minister Sanjay Nishad defended his controversial remark on Bihar CM Nitish Kumar's action with a woman's hijab, citing translation issues and regional dialect differences. He claimed his comment was misunderstood and lacked ill intent. Opposition parties, however, intensified their demand for an unconditional apology, calling his statement misogynistic and undignified.

title: ‘Waiting in vain’: Tharoor reacts to IND-SA match cancellation due to fog; cites Kerala's AQI
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor criticized hosting the India-South Africa T20I in Lucknow due to severe air pollution and dense fog, leading to its cancellation. He suggested Thiruvananthapuram as a better alternative with significantly improved air quality. The match was called off after repeated delays due to poor visibility, impacting cricket fans.

title: OpenAI Code Red: Ex-OpenAI staff says situation critical; warns ChatGPT maker
content: OpenAI's CEO declared a 'Code Red' following Google's Gemini 3.0 launch, urging a focus on ChatGPT's improvement. A former researcher warns Google's advancements could cripple OpenAI's API and subscription services. Internal memos reveal a company-wide push for speed and reliability amidst Google's 'full-stack' advantage, including proprietary chips and product integration.

title: 6 thalassaemic kids test HIV+ after blood transfusion at MP's govt hospital
content: Six children with thalassaemia in Madhya Pradesh's Satna district have tested HIV-positive, with contaminated blood transfusions suspected as the cause for five. A state-level probe is underway to trace nearly 350 potential donors and examine blood bank protocols. Affected children are receiving treatment, and authorities are investigating the extent of exposure.

title: 'Action on those below BS-IV': SC modifies order on older vehicles exemption in Delhi
content: The Supreme Court has revised its order on older vehicles, now targeting those failing BS-IV emission standards amid Delhi's severe air pollution. The court also urged practical solutions, including temporary suspension of nine toll plazas to curb traffic congestion and pollution. Direct financial aid for affected construction workers was also discussed.

title: US travel ban now covers 20 percent of world countries
content: The Trump administration is significantly expanding its 2025 US travel ban, adding 20 countries, primarily from Africa, to existing restrictions. This policy, effective January 1, 2026, cites national security and public safety concerns, including vulnerabilities in screening processes. The expansion targets countries with alleged corruption and unreliable documentation, impacting both full and partial entry bans.

title: Amazon layoffs: Biggest ever job cuts in Europe; these roles are impacted the most
content: Amazon is cutting 370 jobs, or 8.5%, at its European headquarters in Luxembourg, impacting software developers most due to AI advancements. This is company's biggest ever job cuts in the Europe, following global layoffs back in October and a negotiated social plan. Despite the reduction, Luxembourg remains a strategic European hub for Amazon, which continues to hire in key areas.

title: AI in classrooms: Helping students learn or doing the thinking for them?
content: The future classroom blends AI efficiency with human insight, teaching students not just answers but how to think.

title: How police secretly tracked missing coach Travis Turner before abuse charges
content: Experts believe fugitive football coach Travis Turner was likely caught through a secret police sting or flagged online activity. Authorities say Turner faces 10 child pornography-related charges. While police remain silent, criminologists told the Daily Mail that undercover officers, tech company reports, or device searches likely led to the case.

title: Stephen & Ayesha Curry net worth 2025: Earnings, assets and investments
content: NBA star Stephen Curry and his wife Ayesha, a successful chef and entrepreneur, boast a combined net worth nearing $290 million by late 2025. Stephen's wealth, estimated at $240 million, stems from lucrative NBA contracts and endorsements. Ayesha contributes around $50 million through her media ventures and businesses, showcasing their impressive financial success.

title: Terence Crawford Net Worth 2025: Unbeaten boxer’s earnings and investments
content: Unbeaten boxing sensation Terence Crawford has retired at the age of 38, declaring he has nothing left to prove after a stellar career.  His perfect record includes dominating multiple weight classes and defeating top names.  Crawford's impressive earnings are estimated at over $60 million from fights alone, along with his endorsements and investments.

title: 'Other franchises were sleeping': Ashwin shocked as MI snap up de Kock for Rs 1 cr
content: Mumbai Indians made a smart acquisition in the IPL 2026 mini auction. They secured Quinton de Kock for Rs 1 crore. This move adds firepower to their top order. Ravichandran Ashwin praised the strategic buy. Mumbai Indians look stronger after the auction. They also added other players to their lineup.

title: Susie's Qs breaks MAGA myths: How Trump's chief of staff revealed White House secrets
content: Which is precisely why her remarks in Part 1 of Vanity Fair’s profile landed with such force. This was not a tell-all, nor was it an act of disloyalty. It was something more unsettling: a calm, on-the-record explanation of how Trumpworld actually functions, delivered by the person whose job is to keep it running. What followed was not chaos. It was clarity.

title: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana a good post-office savings scheme, but is it enough? Explained
content: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY) offers a government-backed 8.2% tax-free interest for girl children, aiming to fund their future education or marriage. While a secure fixed-income option, experts suggest combining it with equity investments for better inflation-beating returns over its 21-year maturity period.

title: PM Modi arrives in Muscat: Received by Oman dy PM at airport; meets Indian diaspora
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived in Muscat, Oman, for a two-day visit, aiming to strengthen bilateral ties. The trip focuses on finalizing a comprehensive economic partnership agreement, a significant step to deepen trade and investment. Discussions will also cover strategic cooperation in areas like energy, defence, and culture, marking a new chapter in India-Oman relations.

title: The silent killer in our bathrooms: When geysers turn deadly
content: Geysers are commonly used in Indian homes and are quite a necessity in winters. But with so many electrocution and suffocation deaths reported, experts  believe these fatalities can be a result of poor maintenance,  hard water scaling, voltage spikes and improper earthing.

title: Big blow for Indian football! Mohun Bagan banned, fined by AFC
content: The Asian Football Confederation (AFC) has banned Mohun Bagan Super Giant from continental competitions for one season and fined them over USD 100,000 for withdrawing from the 2025-26 AFC Champions League Two. This decision comes amid significant administrative uncertainty in Indian football, with domestic leagues yet to be confirmed.

title: Ahead of SIR draft roll, Ghaziabad flags 10L voters as deleted; Noida lists 4.5L
content: Ghaziabad and Noida administrations have released lists of absent, shifted, or deceased voters for public review before the final electoral roll. Ghaziabad has over 10 lakh such voters, while Noida has 4.5 lakh. Residents can check these lists online and contact booth-level officers to correct any errors or update their status.

title: Huge blow! Shubman Gill to miss fourth T20I vs South Africa due to toe injury
content: Shubman Gill picked up the injury during training on Wednesday, putting his availability for the Playing XI in doubt. Team management is expected to take a final call at the toss. India currently lead the five-match series 2-1.

title: Ayesha Curry admits she never expected to fall for NBA legend Stephen Curry
content: Stephen and Ayesha Curry's love story began in childhood at church, though they didn't start dating until their teenage years. Ayesha's unwavering support, even encouraging Stephen to finish his degree before the NBA draft, solidified his decision to marry her. Their enduring marriage has weathered public scrutiny, with Stephen consistently crediting his wife.

title: New Insurance Bill 2025 cleared by Parliament; opens sector to 100% FDI
content: The Parliament on Wednesday approved the new insurance bill called "Sabka Bima Sabki Raksha Bill after it got the Rajya Sabha nod. It was cleared in Lok Sabha the day before. The bill allows 100 per cent FDI in the sector, raising it from earlier allowed 74 per cent. The bill is now pending for President's assent.

title: Nuclear Energy Bill 2025: Lok Sabha clears 'SHANTI' bill as opposition walks out
content: The Lok Sabha on Wednesday SHANTI Bill, 2025, paving the way for private sector participation in India's nuclear energy industry. This legislation (yet to be passed in Rajya Sabha) introduces a new civil liability framework and strengthens the Atomic Energy Regulatory Board. While crucial operations remain government-controlled, the bill aims to boost nuclear power capacity and applications, encouraging investment in the sector.

title: Gitikka Ganju Dhar on joining Aditya Dhar’s Dhurandhar: ‘Just say yes’
content: Gitikka Ganju Dhar plays Shabnam Jamali, a wild, bossy Pakistani politician’s wife in Aditya Dhar’s spy thriller 'Dhurandhar'. She said yes instantly on hearing his name, calling him the “biggest star” for his clarity and detail. Acting opposite Rakesh Bedi, she “had to pack a punch.”

title: 'Kept begging': How delay & refusals led to Bengaluru man’s death on road; wife donates his eyes
content: A 34-year-old mechanic died after a scooter fall while being rushed to the hospital following a heart attack. His wife alleges that a private hospital's delay in treatment and the apathy of passing motorists contributed to his death. She is demanding action against the hospital and urging for greater public compassion.

title: Messi event fiasco: Who is Aroop Biswas? TMC min who gave up sports portfolio
content: State Sports Minister Aroop Biswas has stepped down temporarily following public outrage over the botched Lionel Messi event. The Chief Minister will oversee the sports portfolio until a fair inquiry is completed. This move aims to quell public anger and deflect opposition criticism, though Biswas retains other ministerial roles.

title: Warner Bros deal battle: Company tells shareholders to reject Paramount Skydance bid
content: Warner Bros urged shareholders to reject Paramount Skydance's takeover, favoring a Netflix offer they believe benefits customers and aligns with board duties. Paramount's higher bid includes cable networks, unlike Netflix's streaming-focused proposal. Both deals face significant regulatory and political scrutiny, with concerns about market dominance and media consolidation.

title: 'Mamata must clarify': BJP claims TMC MP Kirti Azad vaped inside Lok Sabha; shares video
content: The BJP shared a video alleging Trinamool Congress (TMC) MP Kirti Azad vaped inside the Lok Sabha. BJP MP Anurag Thakur had previously complained to the Speaker. The incident is being taken seriously. Lok Sabha Secretariat sources stated that appropriate action will follow examination of the recordings. The alleged act is a serious violation of parliamentary conduct and rules.

title: Pushpa 2 star Sreeleela slams AI deepfakes, makes emotional appeal
content: Actress Sreeleela has strongly urged social media users to reject AI-generated content, emphasizing the crucial difference between using and abusing technology. She highlighted the serious safety concerns AI misuse poses to film industry professionals, particularly women, and expressed hope for authorities to intervene. Sreeleela's upcoming projects include 'Parasakthi' and 'Ustaad Bhagat Singh'.

title: Leanna Lenee silences critics with joyful moment alongside Travis Hunter’s mom
content: Leanna Lenee silenced online critics with a playful dance video featuring Travis Hunter’s mom, Darlene King. The lighthearted moment showed their strong bond and shut down rumors of tension. Fans praised Lenee for handling negativity with confidence, warmth, and authenticity while celebrating real family love over online noise.

title: Pathirana is a huge risk': Former India captain cautions KKR after Rs 18-crore buy
content: Krishnamachari Srikkanth expressed surprise at Matheesha Pathirana's INR 18 crore IPL 2026 auction price, calling him a "hit-and-miss" bowler. Despite a mixed last season, Pathirana attracted intense bidding, with KKR securing him and Mustafizur Rahman as a smart backup. Srikkanth questioned the aggressive pursuit, comparing it to other players who faltered after one poor season.

title: Carpooling app, Rs 2.7k crore push: Delhi minister outlines plan to curb toxic air
content: Delhi environment minister Manjinder Singh Sirsa on Wednesday announced that his government is launching its own carpooling app as the pollution level rises in National capital. He also announced a Rs 2700-crore allocation over 10 years to the MCD.

title: ‘Behave responsibly’: BJP slams Rahul over remarks in Germany, says shows his sentiments for India
content: The BJP on Wednesday hit back at Rahul Gandhi over the his criticism of Centre's manufaturing policy during his visit to Germany. BJP MP Sambit Patra salmmed leader of opposition in Lok Sabha accusing him of insulting India on foreign soil at a time when parliament is in session. He  saying, LoP is a responsibe position and should behave  in “responsible manner."

title: Pace is pace: Ashok’s 150 kph rise, powered by Cummins’ valuable advice | Exclusive
content: Ashok Sharma’s journey from a farming village near Jaipur to clocking 150 kph is a story of sacrifice, mentorship and unwavering belief in pace. Guided by his late coach Vivek Yadav, backed by Anshu Jain, and shaped by advice from Pat Cummins and Bharat Arun, the 23-year-old has emerged as the standout bowler of the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy. With raw speed now married to control, Ashok is fast becoming the speedster to watch out for.

title: James Cameron makes surprising request to SS Rajamouli
content: Hollywood maestro James Cameron expressed his admiration for Indian director S.S. Rajamouli, even requesting to visit his film sets.  Cameron's 'Avatar' franchise, lauded by Rajamouli as a benchmark for big-screen experiences, is set for a massive multi-language release in India. This exchange highlights a significant creative connection between Indian and Hollywood cinema.

title: 'Total failure': SC slams 'ad-hoc' measures for toxic Delhi air; directs to close 9 toll plazas
content: The Supreme Court is pushing for practical solutions to Delhi's severe air pollution crisis. It has directed the Delhi government to directly transfer funds to verified idle construction workers and consider providing them alternative work. The court also criticized the affluent for violating pollution norms, highlighting the disproportionate impact on the poor.

title: "What's Wrong With It": Union Minister Jumps To Nitish Kumar's Defence
content: Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar, facing massive criticism after he was seen pulling down the hijab of a woman and exposing her face at a public event, has found another champion -- the BJP's Union minister Giriraj Singh.

title: Seagull With GPS Tracker Of Chinese Institute Found On Karnataka Coast
content: A migratory seagull fitted with a GPS tracking device was found injured along the Karwar coastline in Karnataka's Uttara Kannada district, triggering concern among residents and security agencies.

title: Counting Of Votes For Punjab Local Body Polls Underway, AAP Wins In 927 Zones
content: Counting of votes for the zila parishad and panchayat samiti elections in Punjab was underway on Wednesday even as the ruling AAP claimed it registered victories in more than 900 zones.

title: E-Cigarettes Banned Under Law, No Cases Of Drug-Laced Vapes: Centre
content: Asserting that electronic cigarettes remain completely banned under Indian law, the government informed Parliament that no case related to the seizure of e-cigarettes and vape devices with narcotic substances has been investigated by the NCB.

title: Energy In Room At PM Modi-Putin Meet A Gift From Trump: Fareed Zakaria
content: The visible bonhomie between Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Russian President Vladimir Putin during their recent summit in India was, in many ways, a "gift from Trump," foreign policy analyst Fareed Zakaria said in an exclusive interview with NDTV.

title: Telangana Speaker Dismisses Disqualification Pleas Against 5 BRS Lawmakers
content: Telangana Assembly Speaker Gaddam Prasad Kumar dismissed disqualification petitions against five MLAs accused of defecting from the Bharat Rashtra Samithi to the ruling Congress, saying there was no solid proof that they had given up party membership

title: "There's A Deal To Be Had": Fareed Zakaria To NDTV On Trump, India-US Trade
content: A trade deal with the US is possible provided India handles it a certain way, since President Donald Trump, though transactional, also wants to announce a deal, Indian-origin US journalist Fareed Zakaria told NDTV in an exclusive interview today.

title: Row Over Women's Scheme In Karnataka Assembly: BJP Alleges Rs 5,000 Crore Scam
content: A heated confrontation over Karnataka's flagship Gruha Lakshmi welfare scheme brought proceedings in the state assembly to a standstill on Wednesday.

title: Digvijaya Singh, Sudha Murty Among 8 Winners At Lokmat Parliamentary Awards
content: The sixth annual Lokmat Parliamentary Awards 2025 were held on Wednesday in New Delhi, honouring Members of Parliament for their outstanding performance in the Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha.

title: GPS-Based Toll System Will Be Operational By 2026-End: Nitin Gadkari
content: The satellite-based toll collection system will be operational across the country by 2026-end, which will eliminate the waiting time at toll plazas for commuters and bring more revenue for the government, said Union Minister Nitin Gadkari.

title: 4 Pilgrims Walking To Gujarat's Dwarka Die After Being Hit By Truck
content: Four pilgrims were killed, and one was injured after a truck crashed into them in Gujarat's Morbi district on Wednesday, police officials said.

title: No PUC, No Fuel Could Spark Chaos At Pumps, Warn Delhi Dealers
content: As the Delhi government prepares to tighten pollution control measures, petrol pump dealers in Delhi have issued a strong caution over the proposed "No PUC, No Fuel" rule.

title: 'Hope His Fans Take Him Places': Vijay's Co-Actor On Political Journey
content: As Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam chief and actor Vijay prepares for his electoral debut, one of Vijay's former heroines offered guarded optimism about his political journey in a conversation with NDTV.

title: "Modi Most Consequential Indian PM Since Nehru": US Journalist Fareed Zakaria To NDTV
content: Veteran US journalist Fareed Zakaria has described Prime Minister Narendra Modi as "India's most consequential leader since Jawaharlal Nehru", adding that most long-serving leaders tend to falter after a decade of power.

title: "Sufficient Material": Goa Court Sends Luthras To 5-Day Police Custody
content: A Goa court on Wednesday granted 5-day police custody of Luthra brothers - Saurabh and Gaurav, co-owners of 'Birch by Romeo Lane' nightclub - where 25 people died, and several others were injured in a fire on December 6.

title: 1 Arrested In China-Linked Trading Scam, Had Duped Man of Rs 32 Lakh
content: A Mumbai-based man was arrested on Wednesday for running an online trading scam with direct links to a Chinese national and cheating a Hyderabad investor of Rs 32 lakh.

title: Delhiites Visit Dehradun To Escape Pollution, Only To Find AQI At 300
content: As a thick winter smog once again engulfs Delhi, forcing schools to shut intermittently and residents indoors, thousands of people are heading for the hills in search of cleaner air.

title: Omar Abdullah's Anxious Hot Air Balloon Ride, And A Mishap Involving Father
content: Going up in a hot air balloon was not an easy decision for Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Omar Abdullah. And when he came back safely in "one piece", he thanked the balloon oeprator.

title: One Nation, One Election Can Boost GDP Growth: Experts To House Panel
content: The Joint Parliamentary Committee examining the One Nation, One Election proposal on Tuesday heard submissions from senior economists who outlined potential macroeconomic and governance benefits of conducting simultaneous elections.

title: Parliament Set For Key Discussion On Pollution As Delhi Air Quality Plummets
content: A long-awaited discussion on air pollution is likely to take place during the Parliament's Winter Session proceedings on Thursday.

title: Abdul Carter, Trevor Lawrence lead Madden NFL 26 Team of the Week 15
content: 94 OVR item is his best yet, bettering the cards he received in the Breakout and Campus Heroes programs . he won the second Limited Edition slot in TOTW 15, giving him a new best card of the season . the 49ers beat the new york Jets 48-20 to record 330 passing yards and five touchdown passes .

title: Dhaka envoy summoned: India calls out 'extremist elements' in Bangladesh; flags 'security concerns'
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. title: MVPs for every bowl game of the season
content: south Carolina State beat Prairie View A&M 40–38 with a two-point conversion and stop in quadruple overtime . it's one of the most exciting times of the year as the 2025 bowl season is underway! make your picks Our college football experts provide their MVP picks for each of the 36 bowl games this season .

title: 150 prospects, 12 schools, 7 rounds: We stacked players in the CFP by NFL draft stock
content: the top 12 teams of the 2025 CFB season have plenty of prospects for the 2026 draft . we're identifying each player in the playoff who could be selected in the upcoming draft and which round they'd fit best right now . this is where things stand right now and a good picture of which teams could be sending a bunch of top talent to the early rounds .

title: How Wallstedt, Bussi and five other NHL goalies leveled up their play this season
content: jesper wallstedt is a Minnesota Wild goaltender who's rewriting the franchise's rookie record books . he's at the top of a goaltending wave bringing new freshmen to light in the season's first half . it's almost a mystery how these things work .

title: Why Flagg is in LeBron and Kobe territory, Carrington a sneaky pickup
content: Nikola Jokic posted 39 points, 15 rebounds and 10 assists in overtime win against Houston . alperen Sengun matched the moment with a 33-point triple-double . Cade Cunningham becomes the youngest player to score at least 40 in a game .

title: 🏈 Ranking the top 50 players in the CFP
content: seven of the top 10 players will be on the field in this year's college football playoff . apologies to Jeremiyah Love, who we'd love to see there too, but that's an issue for Notre Dame and the ACC to work out .

title: PM Modi shares glimpses of Param Vir gallery with Indian soldiers’ portraits — pics
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." title: Sean McVay, Rams announce birth of son as roster transaction
content: new: "what a crazy week to be playing on a Thursday," coach says . new: he says he's "a blessing to be able to play in meaningful games" new: his wife, veronika, welcomed a baby boy named Christian Alexander McVay . the baby boy was born the day after the Rams clinched a playoff berth .

title: Individual rankings for Week 16
content:
Eric Moody reacts to TreVeyon Henderson's nice fantasy game vs. the Bills. (1:00) ESPN's weekly PPR and IDP  fantasy football  rankings are an aggregate of our rankers (eight PPR, three IDP). They are Matt Bowen, Mike Clay, Tristan H. Cockcroft, Daniel Dopp, Eric Karabell, Liz Loza, Eric Moody and Field Yates. Karabell also provides his superflex rankings all season long. Rankings will be published every Tuesday and are updated throughout the week for news and emerging analysis. PPR rankings: 
 Quarterbacks  |  Running backs  |  Wide receivers  |  Tight ends  |  Kickers  |  D/ST IDP rankings: 
 Top 40 DLs, LBs, DBs from Clay, Cockcroft and Moody Eric Karabell's superflex rankings: 
 Top 150 QBs, RBs, WRs and TEs

title: Delhi HC cracks down on alleged use of pirated surveillance software at Udyog Bhawan
content: It was found that multiple unauthorised copies of the Mirasys software, originally licensed for another site in Gurugram, were illegally copied and surreptitiously installed at the premises of Udyog Bhawan, New Delhi

title: Case registered against IUML workers for alleged caste slur
content: The alleged incident took place on December 13, soon after the announcement of the local body election results

title: Watch: Delhi govt planning overhaul of PUC certificate issuing system: Environment Minister
content: Delhi government is considering an overhaul of the Pollution Under Control (PUC) certificate issuing system as the existing centres are old with many shortcomings Environment Minister Manjinder Singh Sirsa said on December 17, amid the ongoing pollution crisis in the national capital.

title: Psychological distress linked to problematic pornography use, says NIMHANS study
content: Problematic pornography use among Indian adults is closely associated with psychological distress, with anxiety and stress emerging as key predictors, according to a recent study by researchers from NIMHANS

title: Madhya Pradesh revokes Ujjain land pooling scheme amid farmers’ protest call
content: Town development plan for Simhastha Kumbh infrastructure withdrawn after opposition from farmer bodies

title: Opposition, activists oppose new Bill replacing MGNREGA
content: Lok Sabha begins discussion on the Bill; NDA allies support the Bill, though TDP pointed out that a fund-starved State like Andhra Pradesh will need additional support

title: BJP slams Chavan’s remarks on Operation Sindoor, demands apology from Congress
content: The BJP said that the Congress was attempting to humiliate India and the Army on international platforms under pressure

title: Watch: Parliament clears Bill to allow 100% FDI in insurance sector
content: During the debate in Rajya Sabha, the Opposition demanded the Bill should be sent to a select committee of Parliament given the far-reaching impact it has on the insurance sector

title: Lok Sabha clears SHANTI Bill amid questions over liability clause
content: Congress faults government for removing clause holding equipment supplier responsible for failure, recalls BJP opposing 2008 deal on similar grounds; Centre says times, technology and scenario have ‘changed’ now

title: Conduct inquiry into Operation Sindoor, Pahalgam attacks, demands former Maharashtra CM Prithviraj Chavan
content: ‘It is my duty as a citizen to develop the scientific temper, humanism, and the spirit of inquiry and reform, promoting rational thinking, compassion, and progress, rather than blind faith or superstition,’ the Congress leader said, defending his earlier remarks

title: Panel formed to probe HIV infection case in Madhya Pradesh
content: Committee to submit report in seven days on alleged contaminated blood transfusions in Satna that resulted in six children getting infected HIV

title: Kavach installed on 2,000 km of rail network; rollout moving very fast, Vaishnaw tells Lok Sabha
content: The Minister said the Railways has so far laid 7,129 km of OFC, installed 860 telecom towers, connected 767 stations to data centres, deployed trackside equipment along 3,413 km, and equipped 4,154 locomotives with the system

title: Caught in a Limbo: Delays plague R.R. Nagar flyover and underpass projects, commuters bear the brunt
content: Much like last year, two crucial projects aimed at decongesting West Bengaluru’s R.R. Nagar have not moved an inch, while one long-neglected project has finally been revived

title: Mid year assessment: GST rate rationalisation to further hit revenues
content: The State estimates the revenue shortfall of ₹9,000 crore in addition to the revenue loss of about ₹9,500 crore due to non -merger of cess

title: Gita Gopinath backs simultaneous polls, flags logistical challenges
content: Synchronised polls could reduce policy uncertainty, spur economic activity, prioritise capital spending, says Ms. Gopinath; however, net cost impact remains uncertain, she tells Parliamentary panel

title: Student at KISS school reportedly killed by known bullies over bucket; three detained
content: Authorities at KISS are accused of suppressing the murder by misleading the victim’s parents into believing the death was caused by cardiac arrest

title: President Droupadi Murmu arrives in Hyderabad for winter sojourn
content: During her stay, the President is scheduled to attend various official programmes on December 19 and 20

title: Pilot bodies complain to House panel on ‘corruption’ in DGCA, Ministry
content: The meeting was held to discuss the operational meltdown at IndiGo since early December, which led to the cancellation of over 5,000 flights, affecting at least 12.5 lakh passengers

title: In Bengal, seats with high Muslim population have lowest number of unmapped voters
content: Twenty Assembly constituencies with the highest share of unmapped voters have lower Muslim population; researchers say that the Matua population, Hindu refugees from Bangladesh, could be hit hard by the SIR

title: Uttarakhand Governor returns UCC and religious conversion amendment Bills
content: Governor Gurmit Singh flags technical and drafting issues in key legislations passed by Pushkar Singh Dhami-led government

title: NIA arrests ‘linchpin’ in illegal arms and ammunition trafficking case
content: Ammunition was illegally procured from ‘gun houses’ in Haryana and other places, smuggled to Uttar Pradesh, and further delivered to Bihar and other parts of the country, the NIA said

title: 'Make informed decisions': DGCA cautions students headed abroad for pilot training
content: the directorate general of civil aviation (DGCA) has issued a notice for such students and their parents . it has no role or responsibility in the regulation, oversight, quality, progress or completion of pilot training undertaken at organisations/ institutions situated abroad . DGCA India has sounded a caution for students headed abroad for pilot training .

title: NMC instructs medical colleges to include importance of writing legible prescriptions in curriculum
content: The National Medical Commission says the directive is based on the orders of Punjab and Haryana High Court issued on August 27

title: Watch: Bangladesh’s threats to cut NE off cannot be tolerated | Assam CM
content: Himanta Biswa Sarma reacted to a Bangladeshi youth leader’s call to shelter Indian separatists and sever the region from India’s mainland

title: Prasar Bharati’s draft syndication policy proposes to monetise content
content: The draft Content Syndication Policy, 2025, available for public consulation, seeks to expand the reach of Prasar Bharati’s content, and strengthen India’s cultural presence globally

title: Coalition government encouraging sportspersons: SAAP
content: Nearly 421 sportspersons in the State were given jobs in the recently conducted Mega DSC, says of Sports Authority of Andhra Pradesh

title: Parliament clears Bill to allow 100% FDI in insurance sector
content: During the debate in Rajya Sabha, the Opposition demanded the Bill should be sent to a select committee of Parliament given the far-reaching impact it has on the insurance sector

title: Tourism a top priority sector, says Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: Its potential is largely untapped, says the Chief Minister; Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan calls for improving road connectivity to the tribal hamlets as it is a must for development

title: Bevco invites tenders to set up automated bottle collection machines at outlets
content: State government had earlier accorded sanction to charge ₹20 per bottle of liquor and to refund ₹20 to the customers on return of empty bottle

title: Navy commissions MH-60R helicopter squadron INAS 335 ‘Ospreys’ at INS Hansa
content: With the induction of the versatile, multi-role MH-60R helicopter on the western seaboard as the first operational squadron, the Navy has significantly enhanced its rotary wing combat and surveillance capabilities

title: India moving gradually to integration of modern and traditional medicine systems: AYUSH Secretary
content: No sudden or complete merger planned, he says; WHO’s global summit on traditional medicine is an opportunity to strengthen the evidence base, governance, and integration of traditional medicine, he adds

title: Refer VB-G Ram G Bill to parliamentary committee on rural development for scrutiny: Saptagiri Ulaka
content: Ulaka expressed ‘deep concern’ over the prospect of the Bill, which introduces ‘far-reaching changes’, being processed without such examination. Flagging three major issues in a letter, he said bypassing scrutiny would weaken parliamentary oversight and diminish legislative quality.

title: Land acquisition under way for 11 major industries, says Nellore Collector
content: Kavali is likely to be developed as an industrial township with the establishment of Ramayapatnam Port, Indosol Solar and BPCL industries

title: Tropical forestry conclave marks end of KFRI’s golden jubilee celebrations
content: Exhibition of forest research-related equipment and technologies, gathering of medicinal plant cultivators from South India, meeting of representatives from forest conservation research institutions, and inauguration of new facilities and release of publications to be part of conclave

title: KIIFB funds use: CM approaches Kerala HC, seeks quashing of ED notice
content: He contends that the ED complaint does not warrant any adjudication proceedings, and that it has been vitiated by ‘malafides’

title: SVIMS gets new medical infrastructure
content: TTD Chairman inaugurates central medical godown and additional accommodation facilities for patients’ attendants

title: With no clear majority, hectic parleys on to form Alappuzha municipal council
content: In the 53-member council, UDF has 23 seats, LDF with 22, and NDA five. PDP, SDPI, and an Independent have one seat each. UDF and LDF are vying for the support of the Independent councillor

title: BJP slams plea for debate on Central agencies ‘targeting’ Congress leaders
content: Speaker Khader rejects demand by A.S. Ponnanna after House resumes proceedings following an adjournment over the Opposition’s objections

title: Telangana ranks fifth in patent filings, says report
content: Telangana was among the States specifically identified as having contributed significantly to the rise in domestic patent filings, alongside Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh and Odisha

title: Court finds Mohanlal-starrer Karmayodha plagiarised, orders ₹30 lakh compensation
content: Court declares that the story, screenplay, and dialogues of Karmayodha are the exclusive original works of Reji Mathew

title: Despite State-Centre understanding, Sabari rail remains a non-starter
content: The project has not made any headway with the Railways requesting Kerala to give ‘clear acceptance’ to share 50% of the cost instead of ‘conditional acceptance.’

title: RTC unions to begin awareness drive on ‘surprise strike’ after talks with Karnataka government fail
content: Union leaders said the JAC was preparing the ground for a ‘surprise strike’ as a pressure tactic, following what they described as repeated failures by the government to address long-pending demands
